title: GosickS - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Mystery   Romance   School Life   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Anime   Adapted to Manga   Detectives   European Ambience   Library   Living Abroad   Loli   Love at First Sight   Male Protagonist   Mystery Solving   Nobles   Wars
author: Sakuraba Kazuki
description:
Set in a fictional European country in 1924, a Japanese exchange student meets a mysterious, brilliant girl who only leaves the library to sleep. Her brother, a detective, relies on her mind to solve difficult mysteries, several of which draw her away from the library. With a drop of sweet romance, you will immediately become addicted to Gosick!

GosickS is a companion series to Gosick, and fills in some of the gaps before and between Gosick volumes. GosickS I takes place before Gosick I, GosickS II between Gosick IV and V, GosickS III between Gosick VI and VII, and GosickS IV between Gosick VII and VIIIa.>
